name: Get System Time

outputs.name: Month
outputs.description: The current month. Value range: 1 to 12.

outputs.name: Day
outputs.description: The current day of the month. Value range: 1 to 31.

outputs.name: Hour
outputs.description: The current hour of the day. Value range: 0 to 23.

outputs.name: Minute
outputs.description: The minutes of the hour. Value range: 0 to 59.

outputs.name: Second
outputs.description: The seconds of the minute. Value range: 0 to 59.

description: Get the current date and time from the system.
